scripts.wipe: npm run wipe-temp && sudo rm -rf node_modules/
scripts.offline:debug:global: node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 $(npm config get prefix)/bin/sls offline start

scriptsDescriptions.EXPLANATION: dummy object only used to comment built scripts(will be ignored by npm)
scriptsDescriptions.wipe-temp: remove all temporary files in service folder
scriptsDescriptions.wipe: remove all temporary files and possible installed modules in service folder(dependencies should be hoisted using workspaces. TODO: check in the future if it is a npm bug))
scriptsDescriptions.update-dependencies: [BEWARE OF BREAKING CHANGES]script for bumping all dependencies to the latest versions
scriptsDescriptions.check-lint: run eslint script to check for linting errors
scriptsDescriptions.sls: alias for serverless command(further command will be applied. E.g: npm run sls deploy -- --stage local ...)
scriptsDescriptions.serverless: alias for serverless command(further command will be applied. E.g: npm run serverless deploy -- --stage local ...)
scriptsDescriptions.offline:debug:global: [DEPRECATED:USE LOCAL NPM BIN] script used to start serverless offline with docker-compatible vscode debugger(Referencing global node_modules bin)
scriptsDescriptions.offline: alias for sls offline command with debugger(script used to start serverless offline with docker-compatible vscode debugger, referencing local node_modules bin)
scriptsDescriptions.aws:ddb: alias for local container dynamodb aws-cli command(requires a double dash '--' to isolate npm script options from command(aws-cli) options. E.g: npm run aws:ddb describe-table -- --table-name ...)
